result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael R Connely was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Prisoner Throw/Expel Bodily Substances, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.43(2m)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Consecutive to: Consecutive to any other sentence previously imposed.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or will discharge with outstanding financial obligations due, a civil judgment shall be entered for the balance due.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael R Connely

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: filed by defendant and Atty Lawton
filed by defendant and atty Lawton
Filed by District Attorney Jane Kohlwey

Defendant Michael R Connely in court, in custody with attorney Mark D. Lawton.  Jane Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Waiver of Preliminary Hearing filed. Court found probable cause, bound defendant over.  Information filed, reading waived. Rights/Elements.  Defendant pled no contest.  Court found guilty.  Judgment was entered.  Court withheld sentencing, placed defendant on probation for 3 years, consecutive to any other sentence previously imposed.  $518.00 costs.  Submit DNA sample.  No jail credit due.
with Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus to CCI for May 19, 2015 at 2:45
and Notice of DNA and Witness List with Petition for Leave to file Additional Motions w/letter re: discovery material filed by Atty Cross

Defendant Michael R Connely in court, in custody with attorney Adam Raabe.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Raabe requesting new dates, defendant to contact Public Defender's Office for counsel, defendant continues to waive time limits for prelim, WRIT NEEDED  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 27, 2015 at 03:10 pm.  Hearing scheduled for May 19, 2015 at 02:45 pm.
with Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus to CCI for 3/24/15 at 2:45

Defendant Michael R Connely by video from CCI, in custody with attorney Leonie Dolch in courtroom.  Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  $1000.00 signature bond.  Standard felony conditions.  Waives time limits.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 9, 2015 at 01:50 pm.  Hearing scheduled for March 24, 2015 at 02:45 pm.  Bond mailed to defendant at CCI to be signed, along with notice of pretrial and return date.
